channel.title: Comments for Cat's Photos and Crafts

item.title: Comment on Snowy times by LYNN ASHTON
item.dc:creator: LYNN ASHTON
item.description: We will get together when the weather improves,I know Rob is waiting to make plans. My request is for my new Epson connected-we both looked at the instructions and agreed far beyond our ken!-when it can be managed. Keep safe.
item.content:encoded:
We will get together when the weather improves,I know Rob is waiting to make plans.
My request is for my new Epson connected-we both looked at the instructions and agreed far beyond our ken!-when it can be managed.
Keep safe.

item.title: Comment on Snowy times by Liz Ashton
item.dc:creator: Liz Ashton
item.description: Good to hear you're both okay in this weather. Edinburgh centre isn't so bad, lots of snow but not sticking. How are the cats enjoying the weather?
item.content:encoded: Good to hear you’re both okay in this weather. Edinburgh centre isn’t so bad, lots of snow but not sticking. How are the cats enjoying the weather?

item.title: Comment on New bag by Liz Ashton
item.dc:creator: Liz Ashton
item.description: Love the bag, glad Mum's machine is still working! It'll take leather and heavy denim too.
item.content:encoded: Love the bag, glad Mum’s machine is still working! It’ll take leather and heavy denim too.

item.title: Comment on Bye Bye Hannah by Sue
item.dc:creator: Sue
item.description: Cat, I was so sorry to hear this. Your friends human and animal send you love and comfort. Rest in peace, Hannah x
item.content:encoded: Cat, I was so sorry to hear this. Your friends human and animal send you love and comfort. Rest in peace, Hannah x

item.title: Comment on Bye Bye Hannah by Neil Forshaw
item.dc:creator: Neil Forshaw
item.description: That's so sad. I'm sorry for your lose. At least she's had a good innings.
item.content:encoded: That’s so sad. I’m sorry for your lose. At least she’s had a good innings.

item.title: Comment on Debbie Tomkies Dye Workshop by Debbie
item.dc:creator: Debbie
item.description:
Hi Cat,
Glad you had a good time and it was great to have you on the course. Love the photos! Debbie xx
item.content:encoded:
Hi Cat,

Glad you had a good time and it was great to have you on the course. Love the photos! Debbie xx

item.title: Comment on Shawling it up by shelagh plaw
item.dc:creator: shelagh plaw
item.description:
Hi just to say well done on your shawls.....they look really good...
I have been knitting shawls mostly baby shawls..for many years, and have always got one on the go. Most recent for my Great Grandson Jenson... The dressing of the shawl makes all the difference, and you can appreciate the patterns. I do all kinds of knitting and always enjoy a challenge.
Best wishes for your Big Day..
Shelagh Plaw.
item.content:encoded:
Hi just to say well done on your shawls…..they look really good…

I have been knitting shawls mostly baby shawls..for many years, and have always got one on the go. Most recent for my Great Grandson Jenson…
The dressing of the shawl makes all the difference, and you can appreciate the patterns.
I do all kinds of knitting and always enjoy a challenge.

Best wishes for your Big Day..

Shelagh Plaw.
